41121.<voice 00093_00041121><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00093_00041121><start_lip_sync n00090 _normal m00001>Look, there. See that oddly-shaped island out front
there? That's Gamilgo's Shield Island.<stop_lip_animation n00090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

41122.<voice 00158_00041122><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00158_00041122><start_lip_sync n00090 _normal m00001>That's the place where the kings of Gartlant and Glen
were said to have sworn an oath of alliance long ago.
We know very little about it, though.<stop_lip_animation n00090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

41123.<voice 00258_00041123><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00258_00041123><start_lip_sync n00090 _normal m00001>Now, let's get things rolling. COUNTDOWN!!<stop_lip_animation n00090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

41128.<voice 01428_00041128><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01428_00041128><start_lip_sync n00090 _normal m00001>Alright, good work! Has your sleeping courage been
awakened?<stop_lip_animation n00090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

41129.<voice 01508_00041129><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01508_00041129><start_lip_sync n00090 _normal m00001>Whenever you're feeling up to it, you can always come
back and try your hand at bungee jumping!<stop_lip_animation n00090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8017.<voice 00160_00008017><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00160_00008017><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Your Majesty, King Bagudo. It is I, great Sage Eidos.
Heh heh heh... but enough with the formalities, old friend...<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1010.<voice 00395_00001010><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00395_00001010><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>I won't be deceived! You reek of evil!<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8019.<voice 00477_00008019><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00477_00008019><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>K... King Bagudo...! Don't tell me you don't recognize
Sage Eidos?<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1012.<voice 00579_00001012><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00579_00001012><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>Silence! Who do you think you're talking to!!<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8021.<voice 00735_00008021><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00735_00008021><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>Throw the old man in jail! Don't you ever show your
face to me again!<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1015.<voice 00872_00001015><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00872_00001015><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Hoho, I see...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8022.<voice 00997_00008022><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00997_00008022><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>King Bagudo, this is a grave situation.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8023.<voice 01106_00008023><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01106_00008023><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...So this is the sort of problem this country is
facing?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8024.<voice 01600_00008024><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01600_00008024><start_lip_sync n00006 _normal m00001>Allow me to speak, King Bagudo!
This traveler has volunteered to
work as a soldier for Castle Glen.<stop_lip_animation n00006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8025.<voice 01741_00008025><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01741_00008025><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>So someone with a Mark of Adulthood has finally shown
up? I see. They certainly seem to have some skill.<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8026.<voice 01898_00008026><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01898_00008026><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>Do you think you can deceive me? You who seek to
bring misfortune to my country!<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8027.<voice 02030_00008027><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02030_00008027><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Th-that's King Bagudo for you! To think that you could
see their true nature at a glance!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1024.<voice 02187_00001024><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02187_00001024><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>They're just like the old man! Lock them in a cell
and throw away the key!!<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1025.<voice 02523_00001025><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02523_00001025><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>Urghh, it feels like my head is splitting apart...!
That rotten Gartlant...<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8028.<voice 02650_00008028><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02650_00008028><start_lip_sync n00003 _normal m00001>Whatever! Just throw them in prison! Get them out
of here!<stop_lip_animation n00003 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1028.<voice 00482_00001028><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00482_00001028><start_lip_sync n00006 _normal m00001>My name is Zanboa!<stop_lip_animation n00006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1029.<voice 00552_00001029><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00552_00001029><start_lip_sync n00006 _normal m00001>To tell you the truth... The other day, I had an
innocent person like you locked up on the king's orders
and they were released almost instantly!<stop_lip_animation n00006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1030.<voice 00622_00001030><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00622_00001030><start_lip_sync n00006 _normal m00001>So I'm sure you'll be able to get out
soon too! At least, that's what I think!<stop_lip_animation n00006 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8030.<voice 01217_00008030><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01217_00008030><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>What a coincidence to meet you here.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8031.<voice 01217_00008031><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01217_00008031><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Hmm... As I sensed earlier, you've been brought back
to life, haven't you?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1033.<voice 01392_00001033><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01392_00001033><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I learned while traveling the world.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1034.<voice 01467_00001034><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01467_00001034><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>It seems you people of Ethene suffered quite a bitter
fate at the Netherlord's hands.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8032.<voice 01781_00008032><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01781_00008032><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>This situation is completely inexcusable. Please
forgive me, Sage Eidos.<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8033.<voice 02079_00008033><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02079_00008033><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Raise your head, Captain Jidan. It's no wonder that the
current king behaves towards me as he does.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1038.<voice 02265_00001038><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02265_00001038><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>So you know it too! That man isn't the King Bagudo
we know!<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1039.<voice 02335_00001039><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02335_00001039><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>The truth is... The king was ill until the other day...<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1040.<voice 02365_00001040><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02365_00001040><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>He survived, but ever since then he's been suffering
from terrible headaches, he's always on edge, and he
seems to hate everything...<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1041.<voice 02424_00001041><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02424_00001041><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>He never said anything about waging war on Gartlant
before, no matter what the reason...<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1042.<voice 02454_00001042><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02454_00001042><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>What's wrong with the king? Will he return to the kind,
gentle king he used to be once that headache is gone?<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8035.<voice 02529_00008035><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02529_00008035><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I've known King Bagudo since he was a baby. I'm not
just going to abandon him.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8036.<voice 02559_00008036><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02559_00008036><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>But, as you know, I'm very busy. I don't know how long
I'll be able to stay in this country.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1045.<voice 02640_00001045><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02640_00001045><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Well, it's not that there isn't a way to get rid of
the king's headache, but...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8037.<voice 02705_00008037><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02705_00008037><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>Then, Sage Eidos, please show me what to do! I'll do
anything to help the king!<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1047.<voice 03045_00001047><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03045_00001047><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Captain Jidan, if you wish for me to teach someone,
this person may be a better fit for the job.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1049.<voice 03240_00001049><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03240_00001049><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Your name is... <pc>, is it not?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8038.<voice 03240_00008038><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03240_00008038><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Your name is... <pc>, right?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1050.<voice 03270_00001050><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03270_00001050><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>, it will take great courage and
determination to restore the king to his former self.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1051.<voice 03421_00001051><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03421_00001051><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>If you are ready to save this country, come see me at
the inn. ...I'll be waiting.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8039.<voice 03908_00008039><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03908_00008039><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>If the king continues as he is, there will be a
terrible war on the Ogreed continent. If that happens,
many of our people will suffer!<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8040.<voice 03998_00008040><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03998_00008040><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001><pc>, please. I need your help to restore
King Bagudo to his former glory!<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1054.<voice 04086_00001054><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04086_00001054><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>You're the only one I can rely on. Now, please let me
hear your request again.<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1055.<voice 04285_00001055><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04285_00001055><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>Thank you! Sage Eidos was wise to choose you!<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1056.<voice 04366_00001056><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04366_00001056><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>Now, I will escort you to the castle exit. Please go
see Sage Eidos, who's staying at the inn.<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1060.<voice 00175_00001060><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00175_00001060><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Time is of the essence. I will be frank. The reason
King Bagudo is acting strangely is because he is
affected by the Demon Miasma.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1061.<voice 00215_00001061><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00215_00001061><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>He took such an intense dislike to you and I because
he sensed a divine power in us.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1062.<voice 00245_00001062><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00245_00001062><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>You know of the Demon Miasma, don't you? That
abominable dark mist.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1063.<voice 00275_00001063><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00275_00001063><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>It's said that a monster that wreathes itself in it
grows much stronger, but a person who touches it either
dies or has their mind stained with evil.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1064.<voice 00315_00001064><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00315_00001064><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>The once-forgotten Demon Miasma is now active again
because Netherlord Nergel has descended upon the world.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1065.<voice 00345_00001065><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00345_00001065><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>, are you prepared to save this country?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1066.<voice 00375_00001066><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00375_00001066><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>To rid King Bagudo of the miasma that haunts him, all
you need is...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1068.<voice 00455_00001068><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00455_00001068><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>No, it's nothing.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1069.<voice 00485_00001069><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00485_00001069><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>What you need is Realm's Chalice. It still lies in
the depths of Becon Valley in the northwestern part of
Glen Territory.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000783.<voice 00486_19000783><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00486_19000783><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Are you willing to go looking for it with me?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000784.<voice 00525_19000784><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00525_19000784><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>It's not an easy thing to come by, so you must be
prepared. We must retrieve it and return here
immediately.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1121.<voice 03657_00001121><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03657_00001121><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Ohh...! My king... You've returned to normal!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8052.<voice 03844_00008052><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03844_00008052><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>That terrible headache is gone. It seemed like it
would last forever...<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1124.<voice 03944_00001124><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03944_00001124><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>I never thought I'd feel so refreshed again...<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1125.<voice 04054_00001125><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04054_00001125><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>It's not here! My necklace... Does anyone know where
my necklace is?<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1126.<voice 04237_00001126><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04237_00001126><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>I'm sorry to be the bearer of bad news. That necklace's
curse is the very thing that brought you to the brink
of death, my king.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1128.<voice 04458_00001128><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04458_00001128><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>Nonsense! That necklace was part of a gift from
Gartlant Castle as a token of friendship, wasn't it?<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1129.<voice 04613_00001129><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04613_00001129><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>There's no way Gartlant would be so cutthroat as to
send a cursed item under the guise of friendship!<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8054.<voice 04778_00008054><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04778_00008054><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Yes. I thought so too. Perhaps someone unaffiliated
with Gartlant wanted the king dead.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8055.<voice 04837_00008055><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04837_00008055><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>...That abominable necklace never left your neck and
continually cast a sinister light upon you.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1132.<voice 04927_00001132><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04927_00001132><start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>One day, when the priests could do nothing but watch
as your state deteriorated...<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8056.<voice 05223_00008056>「突然 とてつもなく大きな\n 人間:
<voice 05223_00008056>Suddenly, a human woman of extraordinary size appeared.
That woman was Sage Malynn.

8057.<voice 05339_00008057>「ウワサは聞いた。\n 王を助けたい:
<voice 05339_00008057>According to rumor, Sage Malynn then said 'if you want
to help the king, just shut up and watch.'

8058.<voice 05379_00008058>「彼女が呪文を唱えると 私たちが 何:
<voice 05379_00008058>She cast a spell, and the necklace that we couldn't
remove, no matter what we did, just fell off.

1136.<voice 05454_00001136>「これは 魔瘴石のネックレスだ。\n:
<voice 05454_00001136>This is a necklace of miasmite. Malynn said that you
almost died.

1137.<voice 05464_00001137>「そして 王に いやしの術をかけ\n:
<voice 05464_00001137>Then, after casting a healing spell on you and making
sure your condition was stable...

1138.<voice 05484_00001138>「マリーンは このネックレスは危険だ:
<voice 05484_00001138>Malynn said that the necklace was dangerous and took
it out of the country.

8059.<voice 05584_00008059><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05584_00008059><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>So that's what happened, is it? Then Sage Malynn...<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8060.<voice 05674_00008060><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05674_00008060><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>It's not just Malynn.<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8061.<voice 05724_00008061><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05724_00008061><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>This person here is <pc>, who got the
Droplet of Gloris to free the king from his headache...<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8062.<voice 05825_00008062><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05825_00008062><start_lip_sync n00005 _normal m00001>Furthermore, Sage Eidos was the one who gave
<pc> the knowledge required to heal you.<stop_lip_animation n00005 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8063.<voice 05906_00008063><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05906_00008063><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>What did you say?! Sage Eidos is here?<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8064.<voice 06040_00008064><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06040_00008064><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>Mmm... I don't remember anything. Even in the middle of

8065.<voice 06074_00008065><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06074_00008065><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>Anyway, while I was out of my mind, I caused a lot of

1146.<voice 06214_00001146><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 06214_00001146><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>...Speaking of gifts, this is the Key Emblem.<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

8067.<voice 06394_00008067><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06394_00008067><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>But the Key Emblem is a sign of heroism. Can I give it

8068.<voice 06474_00008068><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06474_00008068><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>After all, the person who receives it has to do

1150.<voice 06688_00001150><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 06688_00001150><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>What?! You think I declared war on Gartlant Castle!?<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1151.<voice 06763_00001151><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06763_00001151><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>If that's true... Then if it weren't for this person's

1152.<voice 06847_00001152><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 06847_00001152><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>If that's the case, I understand!<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1153.<voice 06867_00001153><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 06867_00001153><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001><pc>! I thank you from the bottom of my

1154.<voice 06887_00001154><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 06887_00001154><start_lip_sync n00002 _normal m00001>Come now, take it!<stop_lip_animation n00002 CLOSE_MOUTH>
